main event: A bright, reddish-glowing object was sighted moving across a field near Greensburg, Pennsylvania in 1966.
interesting points: The object first appeared as a small, quarter-sized bright object that then grew larger and brighter.
The object made a swishing, whistling sound as it moved.
The witness, a trained student of atomic mechanics, could not identify the object's source or origin.
The object moved quickly across the field and disappeared behind clouds or smoke.
The witness reported the sighting to the state police in Greensburg, Pennsylvania on April 17, 1966.
witnesses: 1 witness, a trained student of atomic mechanics
